NLUCCHESI.

Hi,

I am originally from Brazil, but living in San Diego, CA for about 10 years.

I am a hard working individual with great attention to detail. I am passionate, determinated and loyal. I will not rest until my clients are satisfied.

My inspirations mostly come from traveling the world and being exposed to different people, cutures and environments.

I love to explore the unknown.
